body.name: GermGuardian Air Purifier for Home, Large Rooms, H13 HEPA Filter, Removes Dust, Allergens, Smoke, Pollen, Odors, Mold, UV-C Light Helps Reduce Germs, 28 Inch, Black, AC5350B
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 3 hrs 32 mins
features: ✅【HIGH PERFORMANCE AIR PURIFIER】Circulates the air 1x per hour in 870 square foot rooms and 4.8x per hour in 180 sq. ft rooms, ensuring thorough purification. Ideal for medium to large sized rooms such as: dorm rooms, bedrooms, and other living areas!

✅【TRUE HEPA FILTRATION】This air purifier for home features a True HEPA air filter that captures up to 99.97% of harmful germs, dust, pollen, pet dander, mold spores, and other allergens as small as 0.1 microns from the air
✅【FIGHTS GERMS】Equipped with UV-C light technology, this air purifier helps reduce airborne viruses, such as influenza, staph, and rhinovirus, while also targeting volatile organic compounds (VOCs)
✅【TRAPS ALLERGENS】Pre-filter traps dust, pet hair, and other large particles while extending the life of the HEPA filter, ensuring long-lasting performance

✅【ZERO OZONE CERTIFIED】Our air purifier is Ultraviolet - C (UV-C) enabled, providing an extra layer of defense, helping to reduce airborne germs such as Staphylococcus Albus, Escherichia Coli, Aspergillus Niger, and Phi-X174 as well as airborne bacteria and mold spores*
✅【REDUCES ODORS】With an activated charcoal filter, this tower air purifier helps to reduce unwanted odors from pets, smoke, cooking fumes, and more
✅【QUIET OPERATION】Features 5 speeds and an 8-hour timer. Plus, the lowest setting can be used as gentle white noise at night for a quiet, restful sleep
body.description: The 4-in-1 Air Purifier is perfect for allergy sufferers. With a HEPA filter, it captures 99.97% of dust and allergens as small as 0.1 microns in size, while the charcoal filter captures odors! More than just a filter, the UV-C light helps reduce airborne bacteria, viruses, mold spores*, and works to reduce volatile organic compounds. This air purifier circulates the air 1x per hour in 870 square foot rooms and 4.8x per hour in 180 sq. ft rooms, making it ideal for medium to large sized rooms such as: dorm rooms, bedrooms, and other living areas. The easy to use digital display panel includes UV-C control, a filter change indicator and an up to 8 hour timer. 5 speeds provide high speed allergen control down to ultra-quiet sleep mode. The Elite Collection provides both form and function to provide a superior air cleaning system. The simple, stylish design looks great in any home environment. *Tested with Staphylococcus Albus, and Escherichia Coli, Aspergillus Niger, and Phi-X174

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fierce on the Inside The HEPA Filter traps 99.97% of particles down to 0.1 microns. The activated carbon pre-filter traps dust, pet hair, and other large particles while reducing common household odors. Turbo Charge Your Refresh Sanitizing (optional) UV-C Light reduces germs, viruses, bacteria and mold spores* before releasing the cleaner, fresher air back into the room. Zero Ozone Certified. Large Room Coverage Standing 28 inches tall, it is lightweight and ideal for use in rooms up to 870 sq. feet. Breathe Easy From the Living Room to the Kitchen, Bedroom to the Nursery, an Air of Confidence allows you to breathe a deep, clean sigh of satisfaction.

Zero Ozone Certified All Guardian Technologies Air Purifiers with UV-C are tested and Zero Ozone Certified by Intertek Sustainability. Ozone is typically produced at wavelengths below 240nm. Guardian UV-C lights use a special quartz glass that filers out these ozone wavelengths. UV-C offers a chemical-free approach to disinfection and sanitization. Engineered and Designed in Ohio, USA At Guardian Technologies, our products undergo rigorous scientific testing performed by respected, independent labs in the United States and overseas. Guardian Technologies exceeds the most stringent industry standards to provide cleaner indoor air. Since 2005, our team has embarked on a mission to revolutionize the air purifier industry through the creation and construction of top-notch air quality products . ETL Listed Energy Star Certified CARB Compliant RoHS Compliant Zero Ozone Certified

GermGuardian Filter C HEPA Pure Genuine Replacement Filter GermGuardian Filter C Pet Pure HEPA Genuine Replacement Filter GermGuardian FLT28CB4 Genuine Carbon Filter Replacements Air Purifiers, 4-Pack GermGuardian LB4000 GENUINE Replacement Bulb for Air Purifiers Model FLT5000 FLT5250PT FLT28CB4 LB4000 Primary Filter Type HEPA - True HEPA - True HEPA - True UV-C Filter Description HEPA Pure Filter Removes 99.97% of particles down to 0.1 microns such as dust and allergens. Pet Pure HEPA Filter is meticulously designed to tackle pet dander, hair, and odors. The carbon filter attacks smoke, cooking and pet odors along with harmful VOC's. It helps to lengthen the life of your HEPA filter. 5 Watt bulb with the power of UV-C. UV-C light helps reduce airborne bacteria, viruses, mold spores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5/5 - would recommend this to my closest friends and family
reviews.reviewText: I bought this air purifier to replace a cheaply made, loud Holmes model that I bought from Walmart. To be fair, it did a decent job, but I wasn't impressed at all. So I ordered the Guardian because, I won't lie, I loved how it looked in the pictures and, more importantly, it had received universally great reviews. After using the Guardian for the past three days straight I can personally attest to the great reviews. This machine is quiet, works wonderfully, and is by far the most aesthetically pleasing air purifier I've ever seen.The only unfortunate thing I can say about it, and others have touched on this issue as well, is that there is a burning plastic smell that I noticed for the first several hours upon turning on the power. My room is medium sized, roughly 75-80 sq. feet (if I had to guess), and the smell was quite potent, especially for the first hour. I remember wondering if the thing would be kind enough to suck up its own smell, but the answer of course was no. Luckily, the smell soon faded and this purifier has been great ever since. I've read other complaints about the glowing blue light keeping people awake at night. I'm glad I'm stubborn and ignored these reviews, because those complaints almost kept me from buying the damn thing. I wouldn't say the light is exactly bright, more of a soft glow, but if you're sensitive to that sort of thing (as I very much am) you can simply turn off the U.V. while you sleep. It will continue to work amazingly without this feature running, although I do leave it on during the day while I'm at work. Does it actually do anything? I have no idea.Finally, I want to add that in NJ, where I live, this is currently prime allergy season, but when I wake up I feel completely neutral, as if the air outside weren't saturated with pollen (and God knows what else--it's NJ!). It's actually quite amazing.Pros: great for allergies, strong quiet suction, aesthetically pleasing beyond belief, will keep your space smelling nice, virtually no dust anywhereCons: that damn smell for the first several hoursBe back in a few months with an update!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for individual rooms!
reviews.reviewText: We have two dogs that tend to have a fair amount of hair come off of them and enter the air, fortunately I came across this purifier and the price was fantastic I couldn’t pass it. The look is great, it’s not too big or small, it’s quiet on the highest setting and in the course of a few hours we immediately notice a better quality of air in the room we keep it in! Wether you have pets or not, maybe you just like a fan blowing clean air while you sleep this purifier is great. Keeps air clean, cools you off while you’re sleeping or awake, doesn’t bother you by sound, the size is perfect and the price is right. Nothing to not like!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had my hardwood floors refinished and the dust was highly offensive. I ordered this and it literally worked immediately. The other great unexpected thing is the white noise in the bedroom. The UV light is calming for the room too. I’m going to buy another one soon so I don’t have to move it twice a day. I love it that much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can't give this product enough stars! I would give a higher rating if possible. This product is very light weight and easy to move around. Very easy to use, and on low setting is very quiet. Even on high setting it gives out a perfect "white noise" that I find relaxing and sleep well with on. I have 2. 1 for bedroom and 1 for living room. Not an eye sore either. Very sleek in appearance and modern style. I can definitely tell a difference in air quality. I am no longer in sneezing fits. With 2 dogs and a cat it was very much needed. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than I first thought...
reviews.reviewText: I hate being wrong, but when I am, I take ownership of it and try to make it right. I initially gave this a three star review because I felt like that it was doing a good job of filtering out the particles in the air, but not so good at filtering the odors. I think that I expected too much, too fast. As it has been running in my daughter's (and her two ferrets) room for several days now, it is doing better. It does not completely de-odorize the room, but it is doing more than I thought at the beginning and is worthy of four stars.I am still looking for a filter that can reliably scrub the air of ODOR as well as particles. This is definitely an improvement over the room without the air filter. The odor is lessened a great deal. Not 100% but I would say between 2/3 to 3/4 of the odor has been removed and now, instead of an overwhelming ferret scent when you walk into the room, it is about 1/3 to 1/4 what it used to be. That's GOOD. Not great, but GOOD. Upped to four stars - the original review follows:--------------------------------------------------------------------I am sure this thing probably filters the air of many allergens and small objects of dust and other debris, but that is not REALLY why we bought it. You see, my daughter REALLY wanted a ferret as a pet. She set her mind to getting one and eventually conned my wife into saying that we would "consider it" and that she could "possibly get a ferret."Then my wife did research on them and told her that she wouldn't be able to get one because they are social creatures and it would be better to get TWO ferrets.At this point, I was consulted!?!?! I may be dumb, but I am not stupid. I could clearly see that my daughter had already won the war and any battles I fought at this point would be wasted energy.So, we got Bojangles and Nibbles (short for "likes to eat your toes and fingers").We knew that ferrets have a musky scent (read: strong odor) but we were sure we could keep it under control. We thought that we would bathe them regularly and clean their litter box regularly.Let me give you a quick education on ferrets. 1. You cannot bathe them very often, it is bad for them to be bathed more often than once or maybe twice a month. In fact, over-bathing can cause their bodies to produce MORE OILS and more "scent" to try and make up for the drying of their skin that you do if you bathe them too often. 2. Ferrets have an AMAZING biology. They have a very fast metabolism. Simply put, this means that they go from Mouth to Litter Box in under four hours. That's right, they eat, and they poop. A lot. A whole lot. So there is no "keeping up with the litter box." You basically clean it twice a day - morning and night, and it still stays full of poop. 3. Ferrets have sensitive respiratory systems. This means that they can only have certain, non-scented and non-clumping kinds of litter. Basically, they cannot use litter that would help with the odors.Long story, well - long - these ferrets are quite odor-iffic!That's when we thought of Amazon. After all, we had shopped here for hundreds and hundreds of dollars worth of ferret cages and supplies, why not find an expensive air cleaner for the room and put an end to this madness?Well, it is my experience that so far, we haven't found the air cleaner that can handle Bojangles and Attack-Ferret - I mean, Nibbles. We tried a less expensive model of another brand that didn't even have charcoal in it that I could see, but it had lots of very good reviews - even from people with ferrets. It made no difference.Then I came looking with a better idea of what we needed. I checked both the reviews and specifications and this has it all - UV-C, Hepa Filter and Charcoal. I thought maybe that would be what we needed to make a difference. Well, we have been running it on HIGH (5) with the UV-C light on for three days straight now, and I cannot tell a difference. Not even a small imagined difference.We will give it another week, but likely will pack it up and send it back and try something more expensive.One last note, I'm not certain our GermGuardian AC5350B 28" was brand new. It didn't have any plastic film anywhere and the cord was not wound nicely. It had a twist tie on it, but it did not look or feel as though it had been wound by a machine. I suspect our unit was used by another person who tried it briefly and decided it wasn't going to work, and neatly repackaged and returned. I may be wrong, but if I am wrong, then the packaging is not very professional and that's a strike against it as well.Sorry for the length, I wanted to make it clear what we had done and what was happening. I believe it probably filters a lot of stuff out of the air, but it is not clearing the odors like I had hoped at this price point. Hopefully I can help others out there. I will likely be leaving a review on another air filter/cleaner/ deodorizer soon - and I pray that will be a five star review. Sadly this one is not.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Air Purifier
reviews.reviewText: I like it is easy to move about. The timer function is excellent. At full fan speed it is a bit loud but I set it at level 3 of 5 and it is quietly effective.
